body_html:
Integrated building for HIP into the aten/CMakeLists.txt, aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt, setup.py, and tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh scripts, using the WITH_ROCM flag. And divided the giant patch file into separate individual patches per file in the codebase.

@ezyang - Plan is to merge into master and over time reduce the number of patch files required by making changes to the HIP code base or HIP preprocessing script.

Integrated building for HIP into the aten/CMakeLists.txt, aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt, setup.py, and tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh scripts, using the WITH_ROCM flag. And divided the giant patch file into separate individual patches per file in the codebase.
@ezyang - Plan is to merge into master and over time reduce the number of patch files required by making changes to the HIP code base or HIP preprocessing script.
body:
Integrated building for HIP into the aten/CMakeLists.txt, aten/src/ATen/CMakeLists.txt, setup.py, and tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh scripts, using the WITH_ROCM flag. And divided the giant patch file into separate individual patches per file in the codebase.

@ezyang - Plan is to merge into master and over time reduce the number of patch files required by making changes to the HIP code base or HIP preprocessing script.
